content: Fungiman is hidden in one of the cells in the Pagoda Realm. As you're exploring the Pagoda, pluck all the mushrooms you find. One mushroom in a corner by some bars is the Fungiman, who will crawl out of the ground when you try to pick him up.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fungiman_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Fungiman Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Fungiman Location'.
The content is as follows:
Fungiman is hidden in one of the cells in the Pagoda Realm. As you're exploring the Pagoda, pluck all the mushrooms you find. One mushroom in a corner by some bars is the Fungiman, who will crawl out of the ground when you try to pick him up.
